text: Hi all, Is there any specific group for HubSpot App development group for Market place app.
You can connect with #coe-gallery. This is is best one to have development discussion.

Hello! I'm trying to properly configure authentication for Custom Card displays. I've successfully authenticated a connection using OAuth for the Application to open up scopes and add cards. However, I'm not finding any documentation on authenticating calls coming OUT of HubSpot to the external service, aside from the `X-HubSpot-Signature` coming out of the initial query for the cards. Are there no other authentication methods for calls outgoing from HubSpot?

Hello everyone,
We are developing a digital health care platform,
we need a chat integration feature between patient(mobile) and doctor(web)
 for clinical communications, in hub spot  do you have the feature to integrate chatbot into our internal web application for patient communication.
